briefTitle: Study Comparing Two Strategies of Exercise in Breast and Colon Cancer Survivors and Their Impact on Fatigue
officialTitle: Randomized Study Comparing Two Strategies of Physical Activity in Long-term Breast and Colon Cancer Survivors and Their Impact on Fatigue
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* 18-65
* history of breast or colon cancer
* no evidence of disease
* end of treatment in the last five years
* able to understand the questionnaire PERFORM
* able to manage the accelerometer

Exclusion Criteria:

* mobility limitation
* treatment with beta-blockers
* exclusion criteria for CPET
